value2
--xxx

value31
--xxx
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="field3"

value32
--xxx
Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="file"
Content-Type: application/octet-stream
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

binary data
--xxx--
